name: Ship Commander 3 Design Specs
description: Specification files for pixel-perfect mockup generation. One spec per renderable screen from design/screens.yaml.

specs.name: Fleet Overview
specs.description: Landing screen -- Admiral's command center showing all commissioned ships

specs.name: Fleet Monitor
specs.description: Condensed real-time monitoring view for all launched ships

specs.name: Ship Bridge
specs.description: Per-ship execution dashboard with crew, missions, events, and wave progress

specs.name: Ready Room
specs.description: Directive planning view with specialist crew sessions and sign-off tracking

specs.name: Specialist Detail
specs.description: Read-only drill-down for a single planning specialist's session output

specs.name: Plan Review
specs.description: Mission manifest review with coverage matrix, dependency graph, and approval controls

specs.name: Agent Detail
specs.description: Full-screen drill-down for a single agent with output viewport and error context

specs.name: Mission Detail
specs.description: Mission drill-down with AC phase pipelines, gate evidence, and demo token preview

specs.name: Wave Manager
specs.description: Overlay for reviewing wave execution and batch-merging completed missions

specs.name: Project Settings
specs.description: Global configuration with verification gates, crew/fleet defaults, and export/import

specs.name: Admiral Question Modal
specs.description: Non-dismissable modal for agent-to-Admiral questions with option select and free text

specs.name: Help Overlay
specs.description: Context-aware keyboard shortcut overlay toggled with '?' from any screen

specs.name: Onboarding Overlay
specs.description: First-run 5-step tour with panel highlights for new users
